member.summary: Calculates the skew angles of an images. Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF, JFIF, stream, folder, arrays, archives.

members.member:
Automatically find problematic areas of an image that can significantly impact the accuracy of OCR. Supports PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF, JFIF, and GIF images provided as a file, stream, or pixel array. Supports bulk recognition.
Source images The types of defects to be recognized > Detected image defects or ab empty collection if no defect found .

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.CorrectSpelling(System.String,Aspose.OCR.SpellChecker.SpellCheckLanguage,System.String)
member.summary: Corrects text (replaces misspelled words).
member.param: Optionally. Full path to the user dictionary (frequency dictionary). Dictionary file format: Plain text file in UTF-8 encoding. Word and Word Frequency are separated by space or tab.Per default, the word is expected in the first column and the frequency in the second column. Every word-frequency-pair in a separate line.A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a line feed ("\n"), a carriage return ("\r"), or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed("\r\n"). Every word is expected to be in lower case.
member.returns: Text with replaced words.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.Metered
member.summary: Provides methods to set metered key.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to set metered public and private key
[C#]
Metered matered = new Metered(); matered.SetMeteredKey("PublicKey", "PrivateKey");
[Visual Basic]
Dim matered As Metered = New Metered matered.SetMeteredKey("PublicKey", "PrivateKey")

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Metered.SetMeteredKey(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets metered public and private key. If you purchase metered license, when start application, this API should be called, normally, this is enough. However, if always fail to upload consumption data and exceed 24 hours, the license will be set to evaluation status, to avoid such case, you should regularly check the license status, if it is evaluation status, call this API again.

member.returns: Consumption quantity.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.License
member.summary: Provides methods to license the component.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains
the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.License.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Licenses the component.

remarks.p: Tries to find the license in the following locations:
2. The folder that contains the Aspose component assembly.
3. The folder that contains the client's calling assembly.
4. The folder that contains the entry (startup) assembly.
5. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.
Note:On the .NET Compact Framework, tries to find the license only in these locations:
2. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.

member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains
the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic"); Can be a full or short file name or name of an embedded resource. Use an empty string to switch to evaluation mode.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.License.IsLicensed

remarks.p: Use this method to load a license from a stream.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.DefectType
member.summary: The types of image defects.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DefectType.SALT_PEPPER_NOISE
member.summary: Random white and black pixels scattered across the area. Often occurs in digital photographs.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DefectType.LOW_CONTRAST
member.summary: Highlights and shadows typically appearing on curved pages.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DefectType.BLUR
member.summary: The image is out of focus. This detection algorithm can only identify the entire image as blurry. Specific areas cannot be detected.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DefectType.GLARE
member.summary: Areas in an image caused by uneven lighting, such as spot lights or flash.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DefectType.ALL
member.summary: All supported image defects.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode
member.summary: Determines the type of neural network used for areas detection.
member.remarks: Used in the to specify which type of image you want to recognize.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode.NONE
member.summary: Doesn't detect paragraphs. Better for a simple one-column document without pictures.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode.DOCUMENT
member.summary: Detects paragraphs uses NN model for documents. Better for multicolumn document, document with pictures or with other not text objects.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode.PHOTO
member.summary: Detects paragraphs uses NN model for photos. Better for image with a lot of pictures and other not text objects.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode.COMBINE
member.summary: Detects paragraphs with text and then uses other NN model to detect areas inside of paragraphs. Better for images with complex structure.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode.TABLE
member.summary: Detects cells with text. Preferable mode for images with table structure.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode.CURVED_TEXT
member.summary: Detects lines and recognizes text on curved images. Preferred mode for photos of book and magazine pages.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode.TEXT_IN_WILD
member.summary: A super-powerful neural network specialized in extracting words from low-quality images such as street photos, license plates, passport photos, meter photos, and photos with noisy backgrounds.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.GetSpellCheckCorrectedText(Aspose.OCR.SpellChecker.SpellCheckLanguage,System.String)
member.summary: Corrects text (replaces misspelled words).
member.param: Optionally. Full path to the user dictionary (frequency dictionary). Dictionary file format: Plain text file in UTF-8 encoding. Word and Word Frequency are separated by space or tab.Per default, the word is expected in the first column and the frequency in the second column. Every word-frequency-pair in a separate line.A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a line feed ("\n"), a carriage return ("\r"), or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed("\r\n"). Every word is expected to be in lower case.
member.returns: Text with replaced words.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.GetSpellCheckErrorList(Aspose.OCR.SpellChecker.SpellCheckLanguage,System.String)
member.summary: Find the misspelled words with suggested spellings for a given input text.
member.param: Optionally. Full path to the user dictionary (frequency dictionary). Dictionary file format: Plain text file in UTF-8 encoding. Word and Word Frequency are separated by space or tab.Per default, the word is expected in the first column and the frequency in the second column. Every word-frequency-pair in a separate line.A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a line feed ("\n"), a carriage return ("\r"), or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed("\r\n"). Every word is expected to be in lower case.
member.returns: A list of SpellCheckError object representing misspelled words with lists suggested correct spellings for the each misspelled word, and with the edit distance.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.ImageProcessing.Save(Aspose.OCR.OcrInput,System.String)
member.summary: Use image processing to improve the accuracy of OCR. Create a list of filters that will be applied to the input image in the order you specify. Example to create filters: PreprocessingFilter filters = new PreprocessingFilter { PreprocessingFilter.Invert(), PreprocessingFilter.Threshold(150), PreprocessingFilter.Binarize(), PreprocessingFilter.Rotate(180), PreprocessingFilter.Resize(3000,3000, Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.Box), PreprocessingFilter.Scale(6f), PreprocessingFilter.Dilate() }; You don't need all of them. Set only what you need.
member.param: Path without image names for saving processed images.
member.returns: OcrInput object containing result processed images .

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.ImageProcessing.Render(Aspose.OCR.OcrInput)
member.summary: Use image processing to improve the accuracy of OCR. Create a list of filters that will be applied to the input image in the order you specify. example to create filters: PreprocessingFilter filters = new PreprocessingFilter { PreprocessingFilter.Invert(), PreprocessingFilter.Threshold(150), PreprocessingFilter.Binarize(), PreprocessingFilter.Rotate(180), PreprocessingFilter.Resize(3000,3000, Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.Box), PreprocessingFilter.Scale(6f), PreprocessingFilter.Dilate() }; You don't need all of them. Set only what you need.
member.returns: OcrInput object containing result processed images in stream field..

member.summary: Specify an absolute or relative path to the directory where the resources will be downloaded. If the directory does not exist, it will be created automatically. By default, the resources are downloaded to aspose_data directory in the application's working directory.
member.param: Absolute or relative path to the directory.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Resources.SetLocalPath(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specify an absolute or relative path to the directory where the resources will be downloaded. Pass `false` to the `create` parameter to prevent the directory from being created automatically. If the provided directory does not exist and creation is not allowed, the resources will be loaded into the aspose_data directory in the application's working directory.

Parameter to prevent the directory from being created automatically.
